Explore popular: Explore our most popular formulations designed for radiant skin.
No products: No products available at the moment.
Maxie Born: Maxie Skincare was born from a passion to deliver premium, effective, and safe skincare solutions accessible to everyone. We believe confidence starts with healthy, glowing skin.
Philosophy 1: Founded in 2024, our journey began with a simple question: "Why should premium effective ingredients be a luxury?" We set out to challenge the status quo by formulating high-performance skincare that combines nature's best with clinical science.
Philosophy 2: At Maxie, we don't just sell products; we offer a transformation. Every serum, cream, and toner is rigorously tested (and BPOM certified) to ensure it delivers real, visible results without compromising on safety.
Philosophy 3: We are more than a brand; we are a community of beauty enthusiasts, distributors, and dreamers who believe that everyone deserves to shine.
Vision Text: To become Indonesia's leading skincare brand known for integrity, innovation, and empowering individuals to achieve financial independence through our partnership programs.
Mission 1: Produce high-quality, safe, and effective skincare products.
Mission 2: Continuously innovate based on the latest dermatological research.
Mission 3: Build a supportive community for our distributors to grow and succeed.
BPOM Text: All our products are rigorously tested and certified safe for use.
Premium Text: We use top-tier active ingredients like Niacinamide and Alpha Arbutin.
Community Text: Our business model is designed to help our partners grow financially.
Join thousands: Join thousands of others who have transformed their skin and their lives with Maxie Skincare.
